amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit $1,000,000 from being made available for the Blackstone River Bikeway in Rhode Island and reduce the overall cost of the bill by the same amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in part B of House Report 111-578 to prohibit $1,000,000 from being made available for the Blackstone River Bikeway in Rhode Island and reduce the overall cost of the bill by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 260 (Roll no. 495).
